name: Eloisen_box
description: A cozy blend of golden amber wrapped in creamy vanilla and a whisper of tonka. Perfect for slow evenings and soft playlists.

name: Black Fig
description: Lush fig and juicy cassis grounded by dry cedarwood for a refined, modern atmosphere.

name: Sea Salt & Sage
fragrance: Ocean air, sea salt, wild sage
description: Clean coastal air with mineral sea salt and sun-warmed sage. Bright, refreshing, and airy.

name: Rose Oud
description: Velvety rose petals deepened by smoky oud and a hint of saffron. Dramatic and elegant.
